channel.title: Help with linux
channel.description:
Well I tried to install linux a couple weeks ago,(Ubuntu and XUbuntu) and It deleted Windows XP( my computers useless now) and theres no OS on my HDD..
So im still looking for a Linux Distro that will work for me.
Also which one supports A Linksys Compact G wireless router?

item.title: Help with linux
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You can still use ubuntu or xubuntu, just follow the instructions and ready everything carefully. All distros that support wireless will support your router.

Read full topic
